definition: I (first person pronoun used by royalty or nobility)
one who is cut off from others (idiom)/one who has chosen to follow a solitary path/(can also be an indirect way of referring to an unmarried person)

sentences.english: He was suspected to be a loner with difficulty experienced during relationships.
sentences.chinese: 他懷疑是孤家寡人的困難所經歷的人際關係。

sentences.english: I said that professional writers are solitary drudges who seldom see other writers.
sentences.chinese: 我說職業作家是很少能見到其他作家的孤家寡人。

sentences.english: Ahuramazda brought me help, until I gained this empire;
sentences.chinese: 阿胡拉馬茲達賜寡人予援助，直至寡人佔有此帝國。

sentences.english: Ahuramazda brought me help, until I gained this empire;
sentences.chinese: 阿胡拉馬茲達賜寡人予援助，直至寡人佔有此帝國。

sentences.english: We are able to ask the question "Are we alone in the universe?"
sentences.chinese: 我們能夠問出“我們在宇宙中是孤家寡人嗎？”

sentences.english: The tactics of closed-doorism are, on the contrary, the tactics of the regal isolationist.
sentences.chinese: 關門主義的策略則是孤家寡人的策略。

sentences.english: Everybody was in the army; I was the odd man out, excluded.
sentences.chinese: 人人都在軍隊裏，我卻被排斥在外成了孤家寡人。

sentences.english: Now again you abandon me, and are returning home. I do not know if hereafter I may expect to have another opportunity of seeing you.
sentences.chinese: 今又棄寡人而歸，不識可以繼此而得見乎？

sentences.english: Afterwards this inscription I sent off everywhere among the provinces.
sentences.chinese: 此後寡人詔命頒行此銘文於諸行省各地。

sentences.english: In the bigger international picture, Cuba is no longer such a unique case.
sentences.chinese: 在國際上，古巴不再是孤家寡人了。

definition: courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
I, me (self-referring by a widowed empress etc, used in historical novels and operas)
the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)
the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
my late father/my ancestors/the late emperor
